kpi_info.title: INTER FREQ HO ATTEMPTS FORCED BY CELL SHUTDOWN FOR NRT
kpi_info.use: The number of Inter-frequency handover attempts due to cell shutdown procedure for NRT. UPDATED:When an RNC decides to make an Inter-frequency hard handover attempt forced by cell shutdown. In Inter-RNC case, the RNC sends a RANAP: RELOCATION REQUIRED mes
